body_html:
We are hoping to implement as many TF operations as we can for the Knureon. To the extent we have a 'trick' we are focusing on sparse matrices because we believe we can show a significant performance improvement.

Is there a white paper available on XLA? Is the source on a branch? I don't see sparse matrices mentioned in the prerelease.

Also, is there a target release date for XLA? Our own schedule may require us to support traditional TF kernels for our first release, at least.
body_text:
We are hoping to implement as many TF operations as we can for the Knureon.  To the extent we have a 'trick' we are focusing on sparse matrices because we believe we can show a significant performance improvement.
Is there a white paper available on XLA?  Is the source on a branch?  I don't see sparse matrices mentioned in  the prerelease.
Also, is there a target release date for XLA?  Our own schedule may require us to support traditional TF kernels for our first release, at least.
body:
We are hoping to implement as many TF operations as we can for the Knureon.  To the extent we have a 'trick' we are focusing on sparse matrices because we believe we can show a significant performance improvement.

Is there a white paper available on XLA?  Is the source on a branch?  I don't see sparse matrices mentioned in  the prerelease.

Also, is there a target release date for XLA?  Our own schedule may require us to support traditional TF kernels for our first release, at least.
